channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report E-2024060049
item.description:
Report E-2024060049

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-17
  • City: FOUNTAIN
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DYNO NOBEL INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 400300
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: The CTMV was travelling northeast on NC 222. The truck drove off the right side of the roadway, overcorrected, and then skidded across the center line and overturned onto its side. The CTMV rolled onto the passenger side of the vehicle across NC 222. During the rollover the force of impact caused the manway failure. Approximately 2,000 lbs. of emulsion spilled from the tank onto the ground. A hazardous materials contractor recovered the spilled emulsion and remediated the soil. The cost for the cleanup and remediation is still pending final notification from the contractor.
